QuestData.Title: Discover Rolf's Fate
QuestData.Description: Upon further searching the area, you find webbed footprints leading east along the shore of Stone Cairn Lake. In the distance to the east, you can just barely see a Murloc village.$B$BPerhaps Rolf's fate ended there...
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the murloc village for Rolf, or signs of his death.
QuestData.RewardText: You find around the neck of the corpse a metal medallion inscribed with the words: "Footman Rolf Hartford."
